1. Incident involving the use of the N-word by a guest speaker during a classroom presentation at George Brown College on March 15, 2023.

Dr. Gervan Fearon is the President of George Brown College. The college is committed to confronting racism and fostering a safe and respectful learning, teaching and working community animated by principles of equity, diversity, mutual respect, and accountability. An incident occurred that was unacceptable and against these principles, and the college will continue to work towards building a safe and inclusive community for all students and employees. The institution is deeply committed to ensuring employees receive Anti-Racism training and implementing a comprehensive Anti-Racism Action Plan, including signing the Scarborough Charter on Anti-Black Racism and Black Inclusion.
